title: Wall Street, crypto industry say tokenization will reshape global markets: 'It’s going to eat the entire financial system' - Yahoo Finance
summary:
The crypto industry, along with Wall Street heavyweights, wants to bring tokenized stocks, or digital versions of traditional shares that are recorded on a blockchain's digital ledger, into the mainstream.
It can’t be stopped, and eventually it’s going to eat the entire financial system,” Robinhood (HOOD) CEO Vlad Tenev said at a crypto conference in Singapore on Wednesday.
Meanwhile, Wall Street firms ranging from Goldman Sachs to asset manager BlackRock have already rolled out tokenized money-market funds.
In its September proposal, Nasdaq emphasized the tokenized securities it aims to list would have the same exact value and shareholder rights as their traditional counterparts.
Ether, the second-largest digital asset, was relatively unchanged at $4,563 as of 9:49 a.m. in London on Monday.
